name: 玛莉亚·魏斯
introduction: Maria Weiss is a singer and actress. She studied acting at the Lee Strasberg Film & Theatre Institute in New York (US). She can frequently be seen in short films and feature films. Her most recent feature film "Spanien" by Anja Salomonitz was premiered at the Berlinale 2012. Her last short-film "Antoine war nie in Wien", a satirical short set in a bookshop was directed by Sebastian Mayr.
